The prescription drug negotiations will put money back in the pockets of the 9 million folks on Medicare who spent $3.4 billion on the 10 selected drugs last year.

nbcnews.com/health/health-ne…

For the first time, Medicare will be able to directly negotiate with drugmakers on prices for the costliest medications. This effort will increase the affordability and accessibility of prescription drugs for older Americans.

📢Big news for Texas seniors on Medicare! Negotiations are moving forward for the first 10 prescription drugs selected for Medicare negotiation as part of the Inflation Reduction Act.

This is a historic step in taking on Big Pharma and towards lowering prescription drug costs.

Ensuring that public buildings have easily accessible defibrillators is a commonsense step we can take to save lives. I’m proud to join my colleagues in urging @USGSA to prioritize obtaining AEDs and making them accessible in federally owned and managed buildings.

Today as we recognize the sixth anniversary of the tragic shooting in Las Vegas, we must recommit to ending senseless gun violence. I continue to be dedicated to passing common-sense gun safety measures to keep us safe.

My full statement on voting to avert a government shutdown.

Shutdown politics are irresponsible and will harm our region. In Texas, over 780,000 moms and young children will be at risk of losing vital nutrition assistance if the government shuts down. npr.org/2023/09/26/120168308…

A government shutdown will only hurt Texans. It could delay payments, like Social Security and veterans’ benefits, and cause layoffs across the state. There was a bipartisan agreement earlier this year & we must work together to use it as a framework to keep the government open.
North Texas is at its best when we work together to strengthen our economy and create jobs. Yesterday, I met with @TX_BLC to discuss how we can work to maintain global competitiveness in Texas.

This is a huge win for North Texas! I was proud to work across the aisle to bring ARPA-H to Dallas, and our new biotech hub will develop life-saving health care treatments and technology. I will continue working in Congress to deliver real results. dallasnews.com/business/heal…

I have asked for my pay to be withheld in the event of a shutdown just like the hardworking federal employees who would be furloughed or forced to work without pay. These folks deserve better than to have their livelihoods disrupted because of cynical partisan politics.

The shutdown will have real impacts on thousands of North Texans. Federal workers may be furloughed or have to work without pay, making it hard to pay their bills and support their families. We must put politics aside and work to keep the government open.
dallasnews.com/news/politics…

This #LaborDay weekend let's remember all the contributions the labor movement has made to grow the middle class and strengthen our economy.

A quick thread on why the #InflationReductionAct is a win for Texas and is lowering costs and creating jobs.
I was raised by a single mom, so I know how hard it is when prices go up. Inflation is moving in the right direction, but we must keep working to lower costs.

One year ago, we passed the historic #InflationReductionAct. We took action to lower health care and energy costs, and deliver the largest climate investment in U.S. history – creating good jobs along the way. 

Let’s build on this progress.
